text:
Claude + n8n + Apollo = AI Deal Factory that replaces $10,500+/month sales teams...

(the exact system we've deployed for 8-figure agency operators)

- No more 2+ hours daily manually researching each prospect
- No more 5% close rates from generic cold outreach
- No more $3,400-$8,200 per prospect for analyst teams
- No more winging sales calls with just LinkedIn profiles

Just one Apollo input → complete company intelligence + solution matching automatically.

Perfect for agencies, SaaS teams & B2B operators.

Here's how it works:
→ Autonomous Apollo Scraping (captures prospects continuously)
→ Perplexity Intelligence Engine (researches company financials, tech, competitors live)
→ Product-Match Logic (analyzes which solutions fit their needs automatically)
→ Strategy Brief Assembly (delivers approach recommendations with context)
→ Pipeline Automation (syncs to Airtable without manual updates)
→ Opportunity Validation Loop (eliminates duds, focuses on high-value matches)

Built for companies with complex product catalogs.
24/7 operation.
Fortune 500 research methodology automated.
